content.raw:
Arthur, thanks but I do not share your optimism any more :wink: … I would like to drop `subt_seed` completely, but then I have issue with reporting artifacts \(I would almost day “damn artifacts”\). I suppose that the communication client should work without ROS - to use zeromq directly is probably another way to hell. One launch file sounds the way to go, but the rest is still unclear to me …

OT our desperate “progress report” is here: [https://robotika.cz/competitions/subtchallenge/virtual-tunnel-circuit/en](https://robotika.cz/competitions/subtchallenge/virtual-tunnel-circuit/en#190925)
content.html:
Arthur, thanks but I do not share your optimism any more … I would like to drop subt_seed completely, but then I have issue with reporting artifacts (I would almost day “damn artifacts”). I suppose that the communication client should work without ROS - to use zeromq directly is probably another way to hell. One launch file sounds the way to go, but the rest is still unclear to me …

OT our desperate “progress report” is here: https://robotika.cz/competitions/subtchallenge/virtual-tunnel-circuit/en
